my:Details.my:Title: Opening / Closing of Hatch Covers - Gantry Crane

my:Hazard.my:ControlMeasures: a) A container of sand should be on stand-by to assist the gantry crane in gaining traction due to precipitation; b) Should the vessel heel beyond the Manufacturer's specified limit due to adverse weather conditions, the hatch covers are to remain closed until the weather improves.
Ensure all hatch coamings, track and walkways are clear of any obstruction i.e. cargo, tools, etc. prior to use.

a) The gantry crane should not be operated at the same cargo hold in which cargo operations are being carried out; b) The gantry crane operator must ensure that all ship / shore cranes are clear prior to moving the gantry crane.
